paragraphs.content: A Song of degrees of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Song of degrees of David.

paragraphs.content: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;
paragraphs.contentHtml: If it had not been the Lord who was on our side, now may Israel say;

paragraphs.content: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:
paragraphs.contentHtml: If it had not been the Lord who was on our side, when men rose up against us:

paragraphs.content: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:

paragraphs.content: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:

paragraphs.content: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.

paragraphs.content: Blessed be the LORD, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed be the Lord, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.

paragraphs.content: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.

paragraphs.content: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Our help is in the name of the Lord, who made heaven and earth.
